ygData.msgSnippet: ... is ... Soul ... to ... supposed to ... as though ... Hydras.. ... Galvatron ... Leader? then ... Is that ... made a ... ways. & in ... of her ...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 3/2/03 8:19:24 PM Central Standard Time, 
> cardhead649@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > Empath understands all too well.  She realizes quickly something 
is 
> > shielding Maxima from her powers, and taps into the power of the 
Soul 
> > Orbs to force her way past the block.  She doesn't like what she 
> > sees, but walks with Maxima anyway, confident in her own ability 
to 
> > defend herself.  "You've been talking with Hydras, haven't you?"
> > 
> 
> Glancing sideways at the former Decepticon. "Thought we were not 
supposed to 
> read minds?" It stunned her for a moment, then she pushed it aside 
as though 
> it didn't matter. 
> 
> "Maybe I have... maybe I haven't. I went to the base to see this... 
Hydras.. 
> for myself. Wheeljack informed me of what happened. Megatron & 
Galvatron 
> merging & forming Hydras." cocking a brow. "An interesting trick." 
> 
> Once again, glancing at Empath. "What is your opinion on this 
Leader?" then 
> looking forward. "By what I understand.. he says you betrayed him. 
Is that 
> correct?" She wanted to get to the bottom of the matter before she 
made a 
> decision or move. 
> 
> She was an independent Decepticon now. Still clinging to the old 
ways. & in 
> most cases, her original programming was more evident than the rest 
of her 
> knowledge. The personality of when she was a Political Aide was 
surfacing 
> above anything else. 
> For a moment, she wondered if this is why Alpha Trion resurrected 
her... to 
> bring peace to them all? Fat chance! She was a Decepticon! She was 
to conquer 
> & rule... or destroy. She ws NOT going to be an Agent of Peace for 
Alpha 
> Trion. 
> 
> She waited for Empath's answer & reply.

"I betrayed him?"  Empath has to laugh.  "I suppose so, if you can 
say that about him keeping me under mind control for 300 years before 
I broke free.  What good is loyalty to someone who would feed dozens 
of loyal followers to Unicron just to save his own miserable hide?  
Hydras only cares about himself.  He wants to rule the universe, and 
it doesn't matter to him what happens to anyone else along the way."  
Empath digs a little further into Maxima's mind, bringing the memory 
of that kiss to the forefront.  "If you bought it, he'd only be upset 
because he lost his newest plaything.  He's using you, Maxima."
